column5: This spacious king size suite will satisfy all your needs for a comfortable and convenient stay in San Antonio.  3 min from I-35, 7 min (3.4 miles) to Fort Sam Houston, 10 min to Downtown San Antonio, 15 min to the airport and 1 hr to Austin, TX.    Military discount We honor those who serve and have served, 5% off for all active and reserve military and their families. Long-term guests are welcome.
